### Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors to remove an existing Jet A-1 fuel dispensing system from the Sable Island National Park Reserve. This project involves dismantling and removing the fuel storage building, access walkway, storage tank, dispensing system, and associated equipment.

### Eligibility and Pre-Qualification
Eligible bidders are invited that have pre-qualified under the Environmental Services – Storage Tanks Category 3 Supply Arrangement (EB218-210758). The list of eligible bidders for this project consists of six (6) qualified contractors, specializing in environmental services for Nova Scotia.

### Evaluation Criteria
The selection criteria for this tender are based on the lowest price. Therefore, the contract will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest total price, lodged at the tender closing date.

### Technical Contact Information
For any questions or clarifications regarding this RFP, contact Carlos (SPAC/PSPC) at carlos.castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Contract Terms
Please refer to the original RFP for complete contract terms and conditions. All offers must be submitted electronically via the Contracting Authority's website.

### Contractors Eligible to Bid
The following contractors have pre-qualified:

- Iron Maple Constructors Incorporated
- Arcadis Canada Inc
- Greendale Resources Inc
- PetroService
- Sutherland Excavating Ltd.
- Terra Services Inc.

Please verify these details. Suitable contractors are advised to familiarize themselves with the RFP and the contract terms before submitting their proposals
